emptyState.title: Start a New Chat
emptyState.description: Select a model and start chatting

intro.title: Where ideas begin
intro.description: Bring ideas to life in seconds or get help with existing projects.

prompts: Build a mobile app about bolt.diy
Build a todo app with React and Tailwind
Build a simple blog with Astro
Build a Cookie Consent form with Material UI
Make a Tic-Tac-Toe game using only HTML, CSS, and JS

starterTemplates.description: Or start a new app with your favorite stack

provider.searchHelp: Try searching for provider names like "OpenAI", "Anthropic", or "Google"

modelSelector.searchHelp: Try searching for model names, context sizes (e.g., "128k", "1M"), or capabilities
modelSelector.disableFilter: Try disabling the "Free models only" filter to see all available models

input.placeholderBuild: How can Bolt help you today?
input.placeholderDiscuss: What would you like to discuss?

mcpTools.title: Available MCP Tools
mcpTools.noServersHint: Configure servers in Settings → MCP Servers

alert.previewErrorMessage: We encountered an error while running the preview. Would you like Bolt to analyze and help resolve this issue?
alert.terminalErrorMessage: We encountered an error while running terminal commands. Would you like Bolt to analyze and help resolve this issue?

llmAlert.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed with {{provider}}. Please check your API key.
llmAlert.rateLimit: Rate limit exceeded for {{provider}}. Please wait before retrying.
llmAlert.quotaExceeded: Quota exceeded for {{provider}}. Please check your account limits.
llmAlert.genericError: An error occurred while processing your request.

reasoning.title: Thinking Process
reasoning.thinkingDescription: The model is using its reasoning capabilities to analyze your question. Please wait.
